description: Erection of a part first floor rear extension, the addition of a basement floor with front lightwell, a new front porch incorporating internal alterations and an infill extension to the ground floor.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: Planning statement, Design & access statement, Fire Statement, Received: 13/03/2023; Landscaping plan, Received 15/05/2023; Outline Construction Logistics Plan, Received 26/05/2023; 462_EX_000, 462_EX_001, 462_EX_01, 462_EX_02, 462_EX_03, 462_EX_04, 462_EX_05, 462_EX_06, 462_EX_07, 462_PL_002, 462_PL_00, 462_PL_01, 462_PL_02 Rev A, 462_PL_03, 462_PL_04 Rev A, 462_PL_05, 462_PL_06, 462_PL_07, 462_PL_08; 'Geotechnical Ground Investigation and Ground Movements Report' (Ref: SKZ_1991/23_November 2023), prepared by AVZ GeoEng Ltd, dated 25th November 2023, o 'Statement of Liability Regarding Flood Defences at 3 Belle Vue Cottages, Chiswick Mall, Chiswick, Hounslow, London England W4 2PP', dated 6th December 2023, 'Flood Risk Assessment' (Ref: AEG0479_W4_Hounslow_01), prepared by aegaea, dated 4th December 2023; Received 14/12/2023.
Condition : 3 - The basement hereby permitted shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
Condition : 4 - Work shall be undertaken in line with the hereby approved Construction Logistics Plan Received 26/05/2023, any changes must be agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.
